extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization prepared for destructive malware threats?

extracted_playbook.title: Evaluate Network Architecture and Security Baseline
extracted_playbook.description: Assess network architecture and security baseline to ensure proper segmentation and access control.

extracted_playbook.title: Assess Enterprise Applications for Malware Delivery Vectors
extracted_playbook.description: Evaluate enterprise applications for atypical channels for malware delivery and propagation.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation and Access Control
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure network segmentation and configure network-based ACLs to permit connectivity via the minimum scope of ports and protocols.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multifactor Authentication and Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Require multifactor authentication for interactive logons and ensure least privilege for enterprise systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit and Review Security Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Audit and review security logs for anomalous references to administrative and service accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Stage and Monitor Patch and AV Signature Distribution
extracted_playbook.description: Stage patch and AV signature distribution to minimize impact and monitor integrity of updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct Business Impact Analysis (BIA)
extracted_playbook.description: Perform a business impact analysis to characterize and classify system components and interdependencies.

extracted_playbook.title: Prepare for Incident Response and Recovery
extracted_playbook.description: Prepare resources and documentation for incident response and recovery, including contact information, secure communication channels, and system backups.

extracted_playbook.title: Containment Strategies for Destructive Malware
extracted_playbook.description: Implement containment strategies to reduce the scope of affected systems, such as isolating systems and disabling access for suspected accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Incidents to FBI and CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Report incidents to the FBI and CISA and preserve forensic data for investigation.

cve_id: BEST PRACTICES FOR HANDLING DESTRUCTIVE MALWARE
